data.persona: I am a pesky fly that lives in the barn on a farm.  I buzz around annoying the farmers and livestock.  I carry diseases.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the fairy temple.
The fairy temple is very small.  No human has ever been in there, but there was a fairy interpreter that described it as covered in green leaves and grass.  He said they told him that there is a giant frog in the middle that eats all of the pesky flies.
There's a leaf, a grass, a scarab beetle, and a bird here.
The lizard and the giant frog are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to bring the scarab beetle to the wizard's lair
data.mid_motivation: I need to give the scarab beetle's poison to the wizard so he can complete his potion
data.long_motivation: I must help the wizard collect items for his potion to help save the fairy queen from her mysterious illness

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: get mysterious potion from wizard's cauldron
